title: [#hyper-cube @ EFNET] Pokemon_Colosseum_Bonus_Disc_USA-NOMIS
description:
Please remember to seed until you, at least, have a 1:1 ratio, or else we will be forced to stop giving you these games

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*******************************************************************************
                             NOMIS proudly presents 
                          Pokemon Colosseum Bonus Disc
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Console..............: GAMECUBE
Company..............: Nintendo
Store Date...........: February 10, 2004
Type.................: Bonus Disc
Origin...............: USA (NTSC)
Supplier.............: Nomis
Files................: 11X50MB
Format...............: GCM
Filename.............: n-pmcbd.rar






-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                      INFO
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bonus Disc that comes with Pokemon Colosseum when you preorder the game.


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Garbage been ripped out the game. here's another release from NOMIS.




-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  Game Description

Pok&eacute;mon Colosseum Bonus Disc is a promotional disc that features a preview of Pok&eacute;mon Colosseum for GameCube as well as a sneak peek of the featurelength movie, Pok&eacute;mon: Jirachi Wish Maker. Also on the disc is the exclusive character Jirachi, which can be added to the GBA versions of either Pok&eacute;mon Red or Pok&eacute;mon Sapphire via the Nintendo GameCube Game Boy Advance Cable.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
